title: Facebook to Halt Instagram Kids Project Amid Pressure From Lawmakers, Parents Groups
sub_head: Move follows concerns about the photo-sharing platform’s effects on young people’s mental health
body:
Facebook Inc. said it would suspend plans for a version of its Instagram app tailored to children, a concession after lawmakers and others voiced concerns about the photo-sharing platform’s effects on young people’s mental health.
Instagram head Adam Mosseri said Monday that the social-media service is pausing its work so that it can listen to concerns and do more to demonstrate the value of the kids version, which was to be ad-free and allow parents to monitor children’s activity.
